page.title: 13REDHILL TOWN
page.content: We live in an area with low unemployment. {Gatwick Airport}is near supplying jobs for many people. In Redhill many new offices have been built as well as many other buildings to make the area better and more enjoyable for people to live in. A new sports centre has been built providing facilities for swimming, squash, weight training etc. The new{ {QUADRANT SHOPPING CENTRE}will also make shopping quicker, easier and safer. However many buildings have disappeared to make way for the new developments, cinemas are now very rare in our area. They were very popular with families but they have lost out to home video. We have many schools in our area though some have merged together to save money. Many young people go into the town for entertainment some do breakdancing.
